strings.string: This channel is missing epg data.
Loading of data already in progress...
[B]Tip![/B] You can also use the scroll wheel
Update program information on KODI startup
[COLOR]Enter the EPG address or provide a path to your EPG files[/COLOR]
does not exist. Default will be set!
[CR]Please check your internet connection or Premium account
It looks like your current skin
is not supported by current version of m-TVGuide
Please try with a different skin...
It looks like the TV Guide database is broken.
Please remove database file using option in plugin settings "Database settings"
Error is not critical and addon will start but please fix the issue!
Error is critical and programs won't be visible, please fix EPG url!
You can choose your own .strm file.
Please enable channel order by number in settings
Press left button to display dialog.[CR]Move up and down to change the position of a channel.
Click [B]Browse[/B] below and navigate to your stream file.[CR]When you have chosen your file you can preview the stream to test if it works in KODI.
Choose a favourite. Only [B]PlayMedia[/B] favourites are supported.
Multiple addons provide this channels.[CR]Choose one to watch the stream.
Show only programs with stream assigned
All online skins are already installed!
Enter password for adult channels taken from mods-kodi
m-TVGuide is configured to stream using
Streaming using that addon is now disabled.
Show navigation panel for mouse or touch
Press one more time to exit
[COLOR]**WARNING!** Resetting your database will cause losing all settings![CR]Only reset if database has become corrupt![/COLOR]
Do you really want to exit
Failure - please check if you have write permissions to that path
Please check if chosen file is a correct settings backup
Stop playback using navi back button
Assign also the streams of low- quality / backup
API connection didn't get any data.
It could be network connection problem,.
Exceeded the limit of free viewing, or too many users.
Buy premium account now to watch unlimited!
Wrong video adress. Playing has been stopped.
Server has closed connection for unknown reason! Please try again.
You do not have a premium account. Starting a sponsored broadcast.
To purchase a premium right now go to:
No active server! We are sorry.
Go to http://mods-kodi.pl/ and accept it, to use service.
Addon is already running - can't be started again
Not existing record destination directory - record canceled!
Can't record due to not configured record application:
Use FFMPEG to record RTMP instead of RTMPDUMP
m-TVGuide is downloading files - please press OK and wait
An error has occurred - try again or install manualy
Can't find FFMPEG or RTMPDUMP in system - please try to install by packet manager RTMPDUMP, FFMPEG or libav-tools or install manualy
Error during automatic import - try importing files manually
Maximum number of attempts to resume recording
[COLOR]FLV format does not work on OpenELEC/LibreELEC systems[/COLOR]
No free stream available in service
Stop player when recording is started
Navigating in OSD previous, next program

[COLOR gold][B]Context menu[/B][/COLOR]
- [B]Go to channel[/B] Choose channel number.
- [B]Programme information[/B] [I](Assigned key "I" or "INFO")[/I] Information from EPG about the selected program.
- [B]Extended information[/B] [I](Assigned key "I" or "INFO")[/I] Extended information from the ExtendedInfo Script plugin for the selected program. To change the language, enter from the main Kodi menu the ExtendedInfo Script settings and select the language in "Language for TheMovieDB requests" and "Autocompletion language".
- [B]Remind[/B] Enable reminder notifications when the program is about to start. Reminders can be set for a single program or any occurence of that program name.
- [B]Record[/B] [I](Possibility of assigning a key)[/I] Enable recording of the selected program.
- [B]Recordings[/B] Go to the recording location.
- [B]Channels[/B] Edit the order and visibility of channels.
- [B]Lists[/B] [I](Possibility of assigning a key)[/I] Listings views can be brought up by channel list, now, next, reminders, recordings and search engine.
- [B]Options[/B] Addon settings.
- [B]Remove/Choose stream[/B] Ability to choose your own streams.
- [B]Exit[/B] Exit the m-TVGuide addon.
- [B]Add favorites[/B] [I](Assigned key "ENTER" or "SELECT" and "C" or "CONTEXT")[/I] A list of favorite programs can be set. Start by adding your favorite list, select Add favorites with "ENTER" or "SELECT" key, go down and add or remove favorite channels with the "C" or "CONTEXT" key. __________________________________________________________________
[COLOR blue][B]Gettings started[/B][/COLOR]
- [B]Information[/B] (Options - Gettings started) Here you will find more information about the settings of m-TVGuide.

[COLOR gold][B]How to start m-TVGuide[/B][/COLOR]
1. Add playback service.
2. Add electronic program guide (EPG).
3. Start m-TVGuide.
[COLOR gold][B]Services[/B][/COLOR]
- [B]Playback service[/B] Before we start we need to provide a playback service for m-TVGuide to use. Usually you only need to enter your login and password to log in to the selected service. It is also possible to add a M3U playback list from a source or from a local file. These credentials should be entered in the Service or Playlists M3U section in m-TVGuide settings. __________________________________________________________________
[COLOR gold][B]EPG[/B][/COLOR]
- [B]Electronic program guide[/B] When selected a playback service you have to add an electronic program guide for m-TVGuide to display all information regarding programs, without it m-TVGuide will not start. The EPG can be obtained by purchasing a premium account on our website: [I]http://www.mods-kodi.pl/[/I].
Link to the EPG should be entered in EPG section in m-TVGuide settings. You are also free to use an external EPG with m-TVGuide. __________________________________________________________________
[COLOR gold][B]FAQ[/B][/COLOR]
- [B]EPG url is invalid message[/B] This usually means that the link to epg is incorrect, please make sure you provided the right EPG link. You can also try to reset the database in settings.
- [B]Foreign channels won't show[/B] Make sure the EPG link to foreign channls is entered correctly, if you are using the World EPG as main source you only need to enable the foreign channels whitout providing a link for each.
- [B]Password for adult channels[/B] The password is provided in the premium links section at [I]http://www.mods-kodi.pl/[/I].
- [B]The channels are visible in m-TVGuide but they won't play[/B] Make sure you provided a playback service for m-TVGuide to use, see the services section above. If the playback service is not working, please contact the service provider not mods-kodi team.
- [B]Can't navigate in m-TVGuide with touch screen[/B] Enable show navigation panel for mouse or touch in settings tab.
- [B]How can I get help with other issues[/B] In the database tab select upload kodi log, the log will be sent to the external server and an individual http link will be given. This link should be forwarded to the mods-kodi administration to get help along with an error in m-TVGuide.
- [B]How to change the language in the extended information[/B] In Kodi menu enter the settings of ExtendedInfo Script addon and select a language in "Language for TheMovieDB requests" and "Autocompletion language". __________________________________________________________________
[COLOR gold][B]Instruction manual[/B][/COLOR]
For more help read the instruction manual on our website mods-kodi.pl [I]http://mods-kodi.pl/articles.php?article_id=64[/I] __________________________________________________________________
[COLOR gold][B]Helpdesk[/B][/COLOR]
Mods-kodi help center. Report errors from m-TVGuide to the mods-kodi administration. [I]http://mods-kodi.pl/helpdesk/[/I]

[COLOR gold][B]m-TVGuide settings[/B][/COLOR]
Information about all settings in m-TVGuide. The code in brackets is either the internal setting name or the action that is performed. The instruction inside parentheses explain the preformed action of the setting.
[COLOR gold][B]Services[/B][/COLOR]
- [B]Max service startup time (sec)[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][max_connection_time][/COLOR] Time to power up stream service (seconds).
- [B]Reconnect broken stream[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][reconnect_stream][/COLOR] [I](Enable, disable)[/I] If stream is not working it will try to reconnect.
- [B]Max numbers of reattempts[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][max_reconnect_attempts][/COLOR] Number of tries to reconnect stream.
- [B]Reattempt delay (ms)[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][reconnect_delay][/COLOR] Waiting time for stream to reconnect if first stream is broken (milliseconds).
- [B]Refresh services periodically[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][refresh_streams][/COLOR] Refreshes the time table periodically to actual program.
- [B]Max stream startup time (sec)[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][max_wait_for_playback][/COLOR] Maximum waiting time for stream to connect (seconds).
- [B]Wizja TV[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][wizjatv_enabled][/COLOR] [I](Enable, disable)[/I] Playback service, enter login credentials from service provider to activate.
- [B]Weeb TV[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][WeebTV_enabled][/COLOR] [I](Enable, disable)[/I] Playback service, enter login credentials from service provider to activate.
- [B]GoldVod TV[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][GoldVOD_enabled][/COLOR] [I](Enable, disable)[/I] Playback service, enter login credentials from service provider to activate.
- [B]WP Pilot TV[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][videostar_enabled][/COLOR] [I](Enable, disable)[/I] Playback service, enter login credentials from service provider to activate.
- [B]Ipla[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][ipla_enabled][/COLOR] [I](Enable, disable)[/I] Playback service, enter login credentials from service provider to activate. __________________________________________________________________
[COLOR gold][B]Playlists M3U[/B][/COLOR]
- [B]Playlist M3U[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][playlist_enabled][/COLOR] [I](Enable, disable)[/I] A file with the M3U file extension is an video playlist file capable to play video streams. __________________________________________________________________
[COLOR blue][B]Playback settings[/B][/COLOR]
- [B]Display name[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][playlist_display_name][/COLOR] Display name of selected playlist.
- [B]Source file[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][playlist_source][/COLOR] Use playlist from a local file.
- [B]Source url[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][playlist_url][/COLOR] Use playlist from network.
- [B]Stop playback while switching stream[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][playlist_stop_when_starting][/COLOR] [I](Enable, disable)[/I] Stop playback of stream before switching to next channel.
- [B]Prefer HD stream[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][playlist_high_prio_hd][/COLOR] [I](Enable, disable)[/I] Select the highest available quality.
- [B]Priority[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][playlist_priority][/COLOR] Select priority of playback service with 0 being the lowest and 11 the highest (0-11). __________________________________________________________________
[COLOR gold][B]EPG[/B][/COLOR]
- [B]Source[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][source][/COLOR] (m-TVGuide, XMLTV) Choose between m-TVGuide grabbing .xml file from network or a .xml file locally stored. __________________________________________________________________
[COLOR blue][B]XMLTV[/B][/COLOR]
- [B]XMLTV file[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][xmltv.file][/COLOR] Select locally stored epg file.
- [B]Search for channel logos in[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][xmltv.logo.folder][/COLOR] Select locally stored channel logos if missing in epg. __________________________________________________________________
[COLOR blue][B]m-TVGuide[/B][/COLOR]
- [B]Automatically set actual streams[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][AutoUpdateCid][/COLOR] [I](Enable, disable)[/I] Let m-TVGuide assign streams to epg.
- [B]Show only programs with streams assigned[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][OnlyChannelsWithStream][/COLOR] [I](Enable, disable)[/I] Only streams that are working will be visible.
- [B]Auto detect EPG change[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][UpdateEPGOnModifiedDate][/COLOR] [I](Enable, disable)[/I] If there are any changes to epg on the server it will automatically be loaded into m-TVGuide, otherwise epg will be renewed when generated days have been terminated.
- [B]Use fast EPG parser[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][useCustomParser][/COLOR] [I](Enable, disable)[/I] More extended information is being ruled out for faster loading times.
- [B]Show channel logos[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][show.logo][/COLOR] [I](Enable, Disable)[/I] Choose between displaying logos or channel names. __________________________________________________________________
[COLOR blue][B]Enter EPG adress[/B][/COLOR]
- [B]Main[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][m-TVGuide][/COLOR] Provide main epg from your premium account on mods-kodi.pl located in premium links. (It is also possible to use epg from an external source.)
- [B]Additional[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][m-TVGuide2][/COLOR] Provide additional epg from your premium account on mods-kodi.pl located in premium links. (It is also possible to use epg from an external source.)
- [B]Additional[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][m-TVGuide3][/COLOR] Provide an extra additional epg from your premium account on mods-kodi.pl located in premium links. (It is also possible to use epg from an external source.)
- [B]Show foreign channels[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][showforeignChannels][/COLOR] [I](Enable, disable)[/I] If enabled this will add possiblity to enter epg for foreign channels from your premium account on mods-kodi.pl located in premium links. (It is also possible to use epg from an external source.)
- [B]Radio channels[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][showRadioChannels][/COLOR] [I](Enable, disable)[/I] If enabled this will add possiblity to enter epg for radio channels from your premium account on mods-kodi.pl located in premium links. (It is also possible to use epg from an external source.)
- [B]Adult channels[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][showAdultChannels][/COLOR] [I](Enable, disable, password)[/I] Enable erotic channels.
- [B]Vod channels[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][showVodChannels][/COLOR] [I](Enable, disable)[/I] Enable video on demand channels.
- [B]Timezone[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][Time.Zone][/COLOR] Select local time. __________________________________________________________________
[COLOR gold][B]Settings[/B][/COLOR]
- [B]Enable TVGuide autostart[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][autostart_mtvguide][/COLOR] [I](Enable, disable)[/I] m-TVGuide will automatically start when Kodi is loaded.
- [B]Enable automatic channel playback[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][autostart_channel][/COLOR] [I](Enable, disable)[/I] Channel will automatically start playing when m-TVGuide is loaded.
- [B]Show notification[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][notifications.enabled][/COLOR] [I](Enable, disable)[/I] Show important information from the mods-kodi team. __________________________________________________________________
[COLOR blue][B]Sleep timer[/B][/COLOR]
- [B]Enable sleep timer[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][sleep__enabled][/COLOR] [I](Enable, disable)[/I] Activate sleep timer setting.
- [B]Timeout value (min)[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][sleep_timer][/COLOR] Put m-TVGuide to sleep after selected time (minutes).
- [B]Timeout action[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][sleep__action][/COLOR] [I](Stop playback, Exit Kodi, Hibernate, Shutdown)[/I] Decide what action m-TVGuide should preform if timeout is enabled. __________________________________________________________________
- [B]Show navigation panel for mouse or touch[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][pokazpanel][/COLOR] [I](Enable, disable)[/I] Virtual buttons will be shown for mouse or touchpad support.
- [B]Remember list of favorites[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][categories.remember][/COLOR] [I](Enable, disable)[/I] Remember the last used favorite list.
- [B]Set keys[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][RunScript($CWD/setkey.py)][/COLOR] Set key shortcuts for different actions.
- [B]Enable channel order by number[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][channel.shortcut][/COLOR] [I](Enable, Disable)[/I] Selecting a channel by number and displaying digits in EPG.
- [B]Play on select[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][channel.shortcut.behaviour][/COLOR] (Don't play, Play) What action to take when entering a number in EPG. __________________________________________________________________
[COLOR gold][B]Video[/B][/COLOR]
- [B]Enable stream window resize animation[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][start_video_minimalized][/COLOR] [I](Enable, disable)[/I] Toggles full-screen playback for video content. For Android systems this setting need to be turned off else subtitles won't be enabled.
- [B]Stop playback using navi back button[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][navi_back_stop_play][/COLOR] [I](Enable, disable)[/I] When back button is pressed this will stop the playback and return to main screen. If disabled it will work as a picture in picture function. __________________________________________________________________
[COLOR blue][B]OSD[/B][/COLOR]
- [B]Enable OSD[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][info.osd][/COLOR] [I](Enable, disable)[/I] This will show an on screen display when playback is started.
- [B]OSD display time (sec)[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][osd_time][/COLOR] [I](Enable, disable)[/I] Time that the on screen display is being shown (seconds). __________________________________________________________________
[COLOR blue][B]OSD buttons[/B][/COLOR]
- [B]OSD on select[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][VidOSD_on_select][/COLOR] [I](Enable, disable)[/I] If enabled it will display osd when pressing select button, if disabled the information dialog will show up.
- [B]Shows extra buttons on OSD[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][show_osd_buttons][/COLOR] [I](Enable, disable)[/I] Activates virtual buttons in on screen display for easier navigation.
- [B]Navigating in OSD previous, next program[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][key_right_left_show_next][/COLOR] [I](Enable, disable)[/I] Ability to navigate channels through out the on screen display. __________________________________________________________________
[COLOR blue][B]Auto OSD[/B][/COLOR]
- [B]Display auto OSD on play[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][show_osd_on_play][/COLOR] [I](Enable, disable)[/I] On screen display will be shown automatically when playback is started.
- [B]Auto OSD display time (sec)[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][osd_on_play_time][/COLOR] Time for the on screen display to be visible (seconds).
- [B]Show OSD on stream change[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][osd_on_stream_change][/COLOR] [I](Enable, disable)[/I] Display OSD when swapping channels. __________________________________________________________________
- [B]Show service name in OSD[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][show_service_name][/COLOR] [I](Enable, disable)[/I] Display name of the service provider when on screen display is shown. __________________________________________________________________
[COLOR gold][B]Database[/B][/COLOR]
- [B]Upload kodi log[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][RunScript($CWD/logUploader.py, primary)][/COLOR] Upload a log by providing link displayed in the window to get help from an mods-kodi admin with an error in m-TVGuide.
- [B]Clear all reminders...[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][RunScript($CWD/notification.py)][/COLOR] Clears out all reminders in m-TVGuide.
- [B]Clear all planed recordings...[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][RunScript($CWD/cleardb.py, clearRecordings)][/COLOR] Clears out all planed recordings in m-TVGuide.
- [B]Export setings[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][RunScript($CWD/settingsImportExport.py, Export)][/COLOR] Make an backup of m-TVGuide settings.
- [B]Import setings[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][RunScript($CWD/settingsImportExport.py, Import)][/COLOR] Import settings that have been backuped.
- [B]Delete custom streams[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][RunScript($CWD/cleardb.py, clearCustom)][/COLOR] Delete all streams that have been manually assigned.
- [B]Clear database[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][RunScript($CWD/cleardb.py, clearAll)][/COLOR] Resetting database will cause losing all settings, might be helpful in case of the data have become corrupted.
- [B]Delete database file[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][RunScript($CWD/cleardb.py, deleteDbFile)][/COLOR] Delete database file.
- [B]Delete all settings[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][RunScript($CWD/cleardb.py, deleteAll)][/COLOR] Resets m-TVGuide settings. __________________________________________________________________
[COLOR gold][B]Recording[/B][/COLOR]
- [B]Download record apps[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][download_record_app][/COLOR] In order to be able to record anything download recording software first, then choose your system and confirm the installation.
- [B]Record destination[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][record.folder][/COLOR] Provide a location for where the recordings would be saved.
- [B]Import RTMPDUMP[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][rtmpdumpExe][/COLOR] [I](Select)[/I] Location for RTMPDUMP software. It is possible to change location to RTMPDUMP software manually.
- [B]Import FFMPEG[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][ffmpegExe][/COLOR] [I](Select)[/I] Location for FFMPEG software. It is possible to change location to FFMPEG software manually.
- [B]Use FFMPEG to record RTMP instead of RTMPDUMP[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][use_only_ffmpeg][/COLOR] [I](Enable, disable)[/I] Select real time messaging protocol to use for the recordings.
- [B]Stop player when recording is started[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][record_stop_playback][/COLOR] [I](Enable, disable)[/I] When a recording is started stream will not be available to watch.
- [B]Maximum number of attempts to resume recording[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][max_reattempts][/COLOR] Number of times recording should be started if playback stops.
- [B]Delete watched recordings[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][ask_to_delete_watched][/COLOR] [I](Ask, Auto delete, Do nothing)[/I] Dialog asking to delete watched recordings. __________________________________________________________________
[COLOR gold][B]Lists[/B][/COLOR]
- [B]Include synopsis in title search[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][program.search.plot][/COLOR] When searching for titles description will also be included. This is what you would expect from most online searches.
- [B]List future days[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][listing.days][/COLOR] How many days to show in above lising views.
- [B]List previous hours[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][listing.hours][/COLOR] How many previous hours to show in listings views.
- [B]Sort list by time[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][listing.sort.time][/COLOR] [I](Enable, disable)[/I] Default listings views are sorted by time then channel. __________________________________________________________________
[COLOR gold][B]Appearance[/B][/COLOR]
- [B]Skin[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][RunScript($CWD/skins.py, SelectSkin)][/COLOR] Select a skin for m-TVGuide.
- [B]Delete all skins[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][RunScript($CWD/skins.py, DeleteSkins)][/COLOR] Deletes all skins. __________________________________________________________________
[COLOR gold][B]Colours[/B][/COLOR]
- [B]Category colours[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][color.category][/COLOR] Select a colour for different category.
- [B]Default colours[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][color.highlight][/COLOR] Select a colour for default, focus, notification and recording highlight. __________________________________________________________________
[COLOR gold][B]Update[/B][/COLOR]
- [B]Update now[/B] [COLOR dimgrey][UpdateAddonRepos][/COLOR] Updates m-TVGuide to the latest version from repository.

[COLOR gold][B]m-TVGuide project[/B][/COLOR]
We created this project in 2013 trying to provide people with an even greater experiance watching TV. The project consisted in the modification of the TV-Guide plugin which was created by Twinther.
m-TVGuide grew among the public being one of the largest television guides for Kodi. We are continuing our work on improving the smallest details of our plugin and we hope that you will enjoy it as much as we do. Thank you for your support. __________________________________________________________________
[COLOR blue][B]Mods-kodi members[/B][/COLOR]
